column1: Event 3  @  10/18/2019  @  11:54:11 AM  @  Find a The Death Cafe Event  @  "With a Death Cafe
column2: the idea is to get people from all backgrounds together over tea
column5: a normal aspect of life that is generally feared by the population. The hope of the Death Cafe movement is to simply normalize this phase of life by allowing groups of people to conversate regarding death. Death Cafe is not a support group or a means of selling services
column6: but is instead a simple social gathering
column7: which can help you feel comfortable of this inevitable happening. There have been Death Cafes all over Colorado and the US."  @    https://deathcafe.com/site_media/img/teacup.jpg   @  REQUEST A TAXI.......
